name: Creepycraft Re-crafted
description:
Story:

After a long day in the mine trying to find diamonds. You decide to return to the surface, which looked darker than usual. The village where you decided to stay for the night was empty, or so you thought. The village had been invaded by a "zombie", which was stronger than the rest of the zombies. Your mission will be to destroy the spawn of this superzombie to end the nightmare.

Creepycraft Re-crafted is a horror top-down game that contains:

  • 4 different enemies
  • Easter eggs and secrets
  • 3 endings
